text: so my advice to anyone starting a
business is to employ good engineers and
scientists and to trust them listen to
their ideas and believe in them and back
them don't be afraid of making mistakes
50% of your decisions would be wrong but
the interesting thing is to learn from
them and then get it right if you're a
young person and you your
entrepreneurial I do recommend that you
go to university and get particularly an
engineering degree or a science degree
or maths degree because it'll help you
and even if your enterprise fails you've
got a qualification to fall back on
there's a saying in the fast-food
industry of if you're not fired with
enthusiasm you'll be far with enthusiasm
I think being passionate and looking at
are you enjoying yourself it's a big
motivator for those around you and a big
motivator if your bosses in order to
make a grove of you please try to
reconstruct ooh the many countries
